mdRecord.dcterms:title: New River Valley Symphony Directed by James Glazebrook
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Production poster for New River Valley Symphony Directed by James Glazebrook. June Wachtlet, harp. Trygve Peterson, flute. Program: Mozart, Concerto for Flute and Harp | Copland, Latin American Sketches | Ibert, Divertissement | Respichi, Trittico Botticelliano.
